title: OPL Icons
body: What is the ETA on OPL icons for the 2016 season?

replies.body:
Hi Turono!

I believe the plan is to have them launch with the new patch, just in time for the season :-)
Likely next patch. All the icons for teams around the world were added to the PBE recently.
its probably when or just before the OPL starts. (I'm not really sure tbh)
